description:
透過古典文學、現代文學與一般文章的選讀和討論，強化學生閱讀與表達的能力，達到語文教育、文學教育與文化教育的提升。

Let students read and discuss classical literature, modern literature and general articles. Students' ability in reading and expression is therefore improved. Chinese, literature and cultural education is enhanced finally.

syllabus.zh:
一、古典文學的閱讀與鑑賞
二、現代文學的閱讀與鑑賞
三、文章結構分析
四、口語訓練
五、寫作訓練
syllabus.en:
1. Read and discuss classical literature
2. Read and discuss modern literature
3. Article structure analysis
4. Oral training
5. Writing training
